casebody.data:
No.-, Original.

Texas v. New Mexico et al. Price Daniel, Attorney General of Texas, Jesse P. Luton,- Jr. and K. B. Watson, Assistant Attorneys General, and Eugene T. Edwards for plaintiff. Joe L. Martinez, Attorney General, and Fred E. Wilson, Special Assistant Attorney General, for the State of New Mexico; and D. A. Macphexson, Jr. for the Middle Rio Grande Conservancy District et al., defendants.

This case is set down for argument on the motion for leaye to file the complaint.
